effects.value: RUMOR_BOARD
KEYED_LOCKER
A clipboard with a sign-in sheet and a few forms. Names are mostly scribbles.
You sign in and take a moment to read the intake notes.
Your entry is there now—date and time. The rest is routine clinic traffic.
A heavy cabinet—well-organized. The labels are intentionally non-specific.
You skim the permitted folders—enough to confirm dates and patterns, not enough to feel good about it.
Locked drawers and tidy label slots. Access looks controlled for a reason.
You don't have permission to open these files.
A door to the side room where they keep the more sensitive material.
The meeting room is closed off. You can hear faint voices, then silence.
Rows of photos and names—kept intentionally indistinct, but the intent is unmistakable.
The clinic entrance leads back out to the main street.

hotspots.name: Exit view mode (Return to control room)

effects.value: traverse_attempt
traverse_attempt
A bolted anchor plate—rated for heavy load. The rope is already secured.
The rope is already fixed to the anchor.
A solid anchor point. You could secure a line here.
You secure the rope to the anchor.
An anchor plate bolted into the wall. You’ll need a rope or line to make it useful.
No rope to secure.
A hand winch with a ratchet. It’ll feed the line down the shaft.
You crank the winch. The line descends into the darkness.
The line is already paid out. The ratchet holds it in place.
You reel the line back up.
A winch and ratchet assembly. It needs a secured line before it can do anything.
Nothing to wind—no line is attached.
Back the way you came—toward the flooded gallery.
Up and right—toward the chamber ahead.
